name: Space Hat
description:
Space Hat is a Fast FPS Platformer, set in a futuristic Sci-Fi world where you play as Vega, a space bounty hunter hired by an organization to execute a contract.
She's one of the most experienced and deadliest mercenary in the galaxy. Better known by the name ''Space Hat'', her mission is to dismantle a space cartel that has become too powerful.

Vega has a range of different moves and attacks including jumps, dash, slides, two fire modes and a powerful punch. The core of the game is about mixing differents combat or parkour moves with her teleporting Hat.



The game has parkour phases, asking for dexterity and combat arena phases in which the player have to eliminate all the enemies. The player's goal is to master the various mechanics to finish the levels as quickly as possible.

Embark on 2 adrenaline-packed levels that offer a unique solo experience : Fast and bloody combats and precise platform phases.
Execute the target and remember the clock is ticking.



  • Kill ennemies with style

  • Teleport everywhere

  • Move at lightspeed

  • Set the best time
